key.name: feature-state-change-beep
key.summary: Beep when a keyboard accessibility feature changes
key.description: Whether to beep when a keyboard accessibility feature is enabled or disabled.

key.name: timeout-enable
key.summary: Disable keyboard accessibility after a timeout
key.description: Whether to disable keyboard accessibility after a timeout, useful for shared machines.

key.name: disable-timeout
key.description: Duration of the timeout before disabling the keyboard accessibility.

key.name: bouncekeys-enable
key.description: Whether the “Bounce Keys” keyboard accessibility feature is turned on.

key.name: bouncekeys-delay
key.description: Ignore multiple presses of the same key within this many milliseconds.

key.name: bouncekeys-beep-reject
key.summary: Beep when a key is rejected
key.description: Whether to beep when a key is rejected.

key.name: mousekeys-enable
key.description: Whether the “Mouse Keys” accessibility feature is turned on.

key.name: mousekeys-max-speed
key.description: How many pixels per second to move at the maximum speed.

key.name: mousekeys-accel-time
key.summary: How long to accelerate in milliseconds
key.description: How many milliseconds it takes to go from 0 to maximum speed.

key.name: mousekeys-init-delay
key.description: How many milliseconds to wait before mouse movement keys start to operate.

key.name: slowkeys-enable
key.description: Whether the “Slow Keys” accessibility feature is turned on.

key.name: slowkeys-delay
key.description: Do not accept a key as being pressed unless held for this many milliseconds.

key.name: slowkeys-beep-press
key.summary: Beep when a key is first pressed
key.description: Whether to beep when a key is first pressed.

key.name: slowkeys-beep-accept
key.summary: Beep when a key is accepted
key.description: Whether to beep when a key is accepted.

key.name: slowkeys-beep-reject
key.summary: Beep when a key is rejected
key.description: Whether to beep when a key is rejected.

key.name: stickykeys-enable
key.description: Whether the sticky keys accessibility feature is turned on.

key.name: stickykeys-two-key-off
key.summary: Disable when two keys are pressed at the same time
key.description: Whether to disable sticky keys if two keys are pressed at the same time.

key.name: stickykeys-modifier-beep
key.summary: Beep when a modifier is pressed.
key.description: Whether to beep when a modifier key is pressed.

key.name: togglekeys-enable
key.description: Whether the “Toggle Keys” accessibility feature is turned on.
